CustomField.formula: "Sales Rep Company Name: "+Sales_Rep__r.CompanyName+BR()+ "Sales Rep Department: "+Sales_Rep__r.Department+BR()+ "Sales Rep Email: "+Sales_Rep__r.Email+BR()+ "Sales Rep Phone: "+Sales_Rep__r.MobilePhone
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This should include rep name, Company, Department, Email and Phone. If any of that is missing, it is missing from the reps users record.
CustomField.label: Sales Rep Info
